Car
Class driverMidlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
      Car.driverMidlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener
public class driverMidlet
extends javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
implements javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener

This is the main class (MIDlet) were the j2me application starts executing

Suha

splashScreen

boolean splashScreen
check if the user started the application. when the user first opens the application splashScreen = true which mean the logo is the main view but if he/she started the application splash=false because the main view is not the logo.

infolist

private javax.microedition.lcdui.List infolist
The list contian mnue options. The list include: 1.Overall: menu option that allow the user to see his over all risk and journy details. 2.Today: 3.History: 4.Driving Distraction info:

Constructor Detail

driverMidlet

public driverMidlet()
This is the constructor for class driverMidlet we initialize the screen display and create the start form.Then we put the application log in the start form. We also add the startCommand ,AboutCommand and the exitCommand.

See Also:
canStart, start, splashScreen, startCommand, AboutCommand, exitCommand
Method Detail

about

void about()
about function initialize the form About and add backcommand and DataCommand to it.

See Also:
About, backCommand, DataCommand

starttheup

void starttheup()
starttheup function initialize all the application' forms and add commands, labels, images to these forms. Also, in the function we intialize the main list view and add icons to it. Also initialize mainrisko object,mainriskJor object,accdaemon object,calllogdaemon,keycapdaemon,journydatabase and speeddatabase

See Also:
Acceleration, Calllog, mainviewRiskoOverall, mainviewRiskoOverLastJourny, ToAcceptGPS, Acceleration, KeyCapture, JournyRecordStore, SpeedRecordStore, #othersCounter, #carCounter, GPSruning, mainviewrisk(int)

startApp

public void startApp()
its like the main function in the desktop application and its the first function the stats runing after the class Constructer. it sets the main form for diplay in the screen and handle its commands.

Specified by:
startApp in class javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
See Also:
start

mainviewrisk

public void mainviewrisk(int x)
manages the main view diplay which show the overall Risk or last journy Risk.

Parameters:
x - if it equal 1 then new risk calculation will take place.
See Also:
mainviewRiskoOverLastJourny.startviewriskcalculation(), mainviewRiskoOverLastJourny.calculateGenralRisk()

car

public void car()
gets called when the acceleration readings indcate that the user is in the car. It first change the boolen vrible GPSruning to true to show that the gps is runing, then it suspend reading from the accelormeter. After that it initialze the gps handling client which is called retriever and starts it. Finally handle the form car commands.

See Also:
GPSruning, Acceleration.suspend(), Retriever, Thread.start()

notCar

public void notCar()
called when the gps stops working so it set variable GPSruning to false and resume running the accelerometer client.

See Also:
GPSruning, Acceleration.resume()

Update

void Update(int aX)
called to update the midlet with the user motion state. If aX=4 then the user is in the car and function car() is called

Parameters:
aX - represent the user motion state if equal 4 then the user is in the car.
See Also:
car()

                          javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable d)

commandAction in interface javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener

speedCommandhandling

void speedCommandhandling()
handle pressing speedCommand.

jorCommandhandling

void jorCommandhandling()
handle pressing jorCommand by display every journy taken todays statistics or display every journy statistics for the day the user specified in history form.

riskCommandhandling

void riskCommandhandling()
handle pressing riskCommand by display over all journy risk view or today risk view or the risk view for the date the user specifed.

okCommandhandling

void okCommandhandling()
handling okCommand in choosedate. Pressing it will get the date user entered in history form and get the journy statistics for that date.

infolistSELECT_COMMANDhandling

void infolistSELECT_COMMANDhandling()
handle selecting option from info list. If the user choose "over all", over all journy statistics will be displayed. If the user choose "Today", today journy statistics will be displayed.if the user choose "History",then choosedate form will be displayed. If the user choose "Driving Distraction info" then driving distraction study statistics will be displayed.

startCommandhandling

void startCommandhandling()
handle pressing startCommand by starting the watcher, if the watcher started it call starttheup() if not it close the application.

See Also:
canStart, starttheup(), Watcher

infoCommandhandling

void infoCommandhandling()
handle pressing infoCommand. Take the user to info list.

backCommnadhandling

void backCommnadhandling(javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable d)
handle pressing back button depending on the current screen display.

Parameters:
d - the current screen display(jorform,carform,infolist,...)

calllogaquire

void calllogaquire()
calls calllogdaemon.startcalllog() in a new thread to prevent blocking the current thread.

See Also:
Calllog.startcalllog()

calllogrecive

void calllogrecive()
calls calllogdaemon.endcalllog() in a new thread to prevent blocking the current thread.

See Also:
Calllog.endcalllog()

keysaquire

void keysaquire()
calls keycapdaemon.keysaquire() in a new thread to prevent blocking the current thread.

See Also:
KeyCapture#keysaquire()

keysrecive

void keysrecive()
calls keycapdaemon.endkeylog() in a new thread to prevent blocking the current thread.

See Also:
KeyCapture.endkeylog()

JournyInitalization

void JournyInitalization()
initilize new journy by : 1. setting the year value 2. setting the month value 3. setting the dayofmonth value 4. setting the dayofweek value 5. setting the hour value 6. setting the minute value 7. setting the journyNo value 8. setting the year value 9. setting JorNolab text value call the functions calllogaquire() and keysaquire().

See Also:
getJournyNo(int, int, int), calllogaquire(), keysaquire()

getJournyNo

int getJournyNo(int dayofmonth,
                int month,
                int year)
gets the current day of month, month ,and year and compare it with the last saved journy in the database day of month, month, and year value, respectivily. if the values are equals then the current journy number equal (the last journy number + 1) else it will equal 1, meaning this is the first journy in a new day.

Parameters:
dayofmonth - the current day of month value.
month - the current month value.
year - the current year value.
Returns:
JournyNo No of the current journuy
See Also:
JournyRecordStore

pauseApp

public void pauseApp()
Specified by:
pauseApp in class javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet

destroyApp

public void destroyApp(boolean unconditional)
before the application exit it make sure that the gps is not runing and if it was, it stops the gps and save the journy data. Also, it check if splashScreen= false. This means the application started and the accelometer client,call log client and key capture client is running so it closes them. Finally, call notifyDestroyed().

Specified by:
destroyApp in class javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
Parameters:
unconditional - if true it destroy the application if it is false it will not destroy the application.
See Also:
splashScreen, Acceleration.stop(), Acceleration.close(), KeyCapture.close(), Calllog.close()
